yooessentials_form.after_submit_actions.label: After Submit Actions
yooessentials_form.after_submit_actions.description: Set actions to be executed after a form has been successfully submitted. The established order is respected when possible.

yooessentials_form.html5validation.description: Enable client side HTML5 validation. Server side validation is always executed.

yooessentials_form.reset_after_submit.description: Reset form to initial state after successfull submission.

yooessentials_form.errors_display_modal.label: Errors
yooessentials_form.errors_display_modal.description: Display server side errors in a Modal instead of the bottom block.

yooessentials_form.errors_display_modal_.description: Set a custom modal content or leave empty for default. Use {errors} placeholder to reference the errors list.

yooessentials_form.name.label: Name Attribute
yooessentials_form.name.description: Optional Name attribute for the form node.

yooessentials_form.id.label: Form ID
yooessentials_form.id.description: Define a unique identifier for the form element.

yooessentials_form.class.label: Form Classes
yooessentials_form.class.description: Define one or more class names for the form element. Separate multiple classes with spaces.

yooessentials_form.attributes.label: Attributes
yooessentials_form.attributes.description: Define one or more attributes for the form. Separate attribute name and value by = character. One attribute per line.

yooessentials_form.override_action_url.description: Submit the form to a custom URL and method, useful for 3rd party form integrations.

yooessentials_form.scripts_onsubmit.label: Before Submission
yooessentials_form.scripts_onsubmit.description: Executes before the submission is sent. Available event, data, and form variables. Return false to prevent submission.

yooessentials_form.scripts_onsubmitted.label: After Submission
yooessentials_form.scripts_onsubmitted.description: Executes after the submission is sent successfully. Available event, form, data, and response variables.

yooessentials_form.scripts_onvalidatione.label: On Validation Error
yooessentials_form.scripts_onvalidatione.description: Executes when the validation errors. Available event, form, and data variables.

yooessentials_form.scripts_onsubmissione.label: On Submission Error
yooessentials_form.scripts_onsubmissione.description: Executes when the submission errors. Available event, form, data, errors, and validation variables.

yooessentials_form.scripts_onfieldchange.label: On Field Change
yooessentials_form.scripts_onfieldchange.description: Executes when any field value has changed. Available event, form, data, and field variables.

fields.name: info
fields.content: Execute custom JavaScript on specific form events. The <script> tag is not needed.
